## Plugin\_2.registerMarkdownPostProcessor() method

Registers a post processor, to change how the document looks in reading mode.

**Signature:**

```typescript
registerMarkdownPostProcessor(postProcessor: MarkdownPostProcessor, sortOrder?: number): MarkdownPostProcessor;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  <code>postProcessor</code> | [`MarkdownPostProcessor`](MarkdownPostProcessor.md) |  |
|  <code>sortOrder</code> | <code>number</code> | _(Optional)_ |

**Returns:**

[`MarkdownPostProcessor`](MarkdownPostProcessor.md)
